laboratory_examinations.findings: The liver exhibits two tiny high T2 signal lesions in segment IVb; gallbladder contains sludge and tiny stones; no evidence of gallbladder wall thickening; pancreatic cysts up to 7 mm; 2.6 cm spleen lesion interpreted as a cyst; left adrenal nodule 1.7 cm consistent with adenoma; left kidney findings suggest multiple simple cysts and hemorrhagic/proteinaceous cysts.
